title: Sponsorship affidavits (I-864)
retention: Until citizenship or 40 qualifying work quarters
dataVerified: Sponsor name/signature, beneficiary name, income documentation, household size
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Sponsorship status (active/terminated). Link to USCIS system (USCIS and benefit agencies, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake affidavits of support. Domain binding verifies sponsor/USCIS. Green card sponsorship requirement. Public charge prevention. Enforceable contract. Prevents sponsorship fraud. Uses SHA-512 (financial privacy).
